Documents by KapitalWise

Getting Started Edit

Welcome to KapitalWise Goal API.

This API document is designed for those interested in developing for KapitalWise platform.

This API is still under development and will evolve.

You’ll succeed if you do this.

Here’s some useful information.

Something may not happen if you try and do this.

Something bad will happen if you do this.

Authentication Edit

You need to be authenticated for all API requests. You can request an API key by contacting us here.

Add the API key to all requests as a GET parameter.

Nothing will work unless you include this API key

 $.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
   alert(data);
 });

 curl http://api.kapitalwise.com/books?token=YOUR_APP_KEY

Errors Edit

Code Name Description
200 OK Success
201 Created Creation Successful
400 Bad Request We could not process that action
403 Forbidden We couldn’t authenticate you

All errors will return JSON in the following format:

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "error message here"
}

/users Edit

List all users

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of users returned

This call will return a maximum of 100 users

Lists all the users in the system. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users?token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
  console.log(body);
}

curl http://sampleapi.readme.com/orders?key=YOUR_APP_KEY

[

  "id": 1,

}

/users Edit

Create User

Parameters
dateOfBirth
User's date of birth
firstName
User's first name
lastName
User's last name
address1
User's address line one
address2
User's address line two
state
User's state
city
User's city
zip
User's zip
email
User's email
phone
User's phone
ssn
User's social security number
passcode
Four digit passcode
password
Password
subBackupWithld
Is this user subjected to backup withholding
usResident
Is this user US resident
brokerDealerAff
Is this user affiliated to any broker dealer
boardMember
Is this user board member of a public listed company

The user will automatically be added and enabled

Adds a user to your collection.

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030",
  "ssn": "152225201",
  "passcode": "3100",
  "password": "kap1talw1se"
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{ 
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User with this email already exists"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Known error"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid password"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid passcode"
}

/users/:id Edit

Get User

Returns a specific user from the system

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{ 
  "id": 3,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030",
  "goalSubscriptions":[124,156]
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/users/:id Edit

Update User

Parameters
dateOfBirth
User's date of birth
firstName
User's first name
lastName
User's last name
address1
User's address line one
address2
User's adress line two
state
User's state
city
User's city
zip
User's zip
email
User's email
phone
User's phone
ssn
User's social security number
passcode
Four digit passcode
password
Password
subBackupWithld
Is this user subjected to backup withholding
usResident
Is this user US resident
brokerDealerAff
Is this user affiliated to any broker dealer
boardMember
Is this user board member of a public listed company

Update an existing user in the system.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
}
});

{ 
  "id": 3,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/users/:id Edit

Deletes a user

Deletes a user in the system.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "status": "deleted"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/accounts Edit

List all books

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of accounts returned

This call will return a maximum of 100 accounts

Lists all the photos you have access to. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts?token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
  console.log(body);
}

curl http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts?key=YOUR_APP_KEY

[
  {
  "id": 3,

}

/accounts Edit

Create User

Parameters
userId
The account owner.
externalId
The external id for the account. Yodlee, Plaid or bank's own id.
accountName
Account name
accountNumber
The masked account number for display
nickname
Account nick name
accountType
Type of account. Checking, saving, credit etc.
providerType
The account data provider. Yodlee, Plaid or banks
loginName
The login name if any
password
The password if any
memo
The memo

The account will automatically be added to the user

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "userId": 123,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassw"
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "userId": 123,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassword",
  "memo":  "Test memo"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid user"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid Provider"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid score"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Get User

Returns a specific book from your collection

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/5", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "userId": 1223,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassword",
  "memo":  "Test memo"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary query parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Requested account not found"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Update Book

Parameters
userId
The account owner.
externalId
The external id for the account. Yodlee, Plaid or bank's own id.
accountName
Account name
accountNumber
The masked account number for display
nickname
Account nick name
accountType
Type of account. Checking, saving, credit etc.
providerType
The account data provider. Yodlee, Plaid or banks
loginName
The login name if any
password
The password if any
memo
The memo

Update an existing book in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/accounts/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "userId": 123,
    "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
    "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
    "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
    "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
    "accountType":  "Saving",
    "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
    "password":  "ydltestpassw"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "userId": 123,
  "externalId" :  "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D",
  "accountName":  "Chase Saving",
  "accountNumber": "XXXX4230",
  "nickname" : "My Chase Saving",
  "accountType":  "Saving",
  "providerType":  "YODLEE",
  "loginName" :  "ydltestlogin",
  "password":  "ydltestpassword",
  "memo":  "Test memo"
}

 {
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid user"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid score"
}"message": "Book doesn't exist"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Deletes a user

Deletes a book in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/accounts/3",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "status": "deleted"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Account doesn't exist"
}

/strategies Edit

Create investment strategy

Parameters
userId
The user for the strategy is created for
accountIds
String Array of account Id's
strategyType
string (enum 'ANALYZE_INVEST', 'ROUNDUP', 'INVEST_WHEN_PAID', 'INVEST_WHEN_SPEND', 'SCHEDULED', 'ONE_TIME')
params
Config params arrays

Add a strategy for the user with a set of accounts

Adds a book to your collection.

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/strategies/", {
"token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
"userId": 123,
"accountIds": ["vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D", "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFED45RT"],
"strategyType": "ANALYZE_INVEST",
"params": [{ key: "max_amount", value:"500.00" }],
"fundIds": [124,156]
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
userId: 123,
accountIds: ["vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D", "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFED45RT"],
strategyType: "ANALYZE_INVEST",
params: [{ key: "max_amount", value:"500.00" }],
fundIds: [124,156],
status: "ACTIVE"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid strategyType value"
}

/strategies/:id Edit

Get User

Returns a specific strategy from the system

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/strategies/123", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

 {
  userId: 123,
  accountIds: ["vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D", "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFED45RT"],
  investmentIds : [234,345],
  strategyType: 'ANALYZE_INVEST',
  params: [{ key: "max_amount", value:"500.00" }],
  fundIds: [124,156],
  status: "ACTIVE"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Requested strategy not found"
}

/strategies/:id Edit

Update Book

Parameters
userId
The user for the strategy is created for
accountIds
String Array of account Id's
strategyType
string (enum 'ANALYZE_INVEST', 'ROUNDUP', 'INVEST_WHEN_PAID', 'INVEST_WHEN_SPEND', 'SCHEDULED', 'ONE_TIME')
params
Config params arrays

Update an existing strategy in the system.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/strategies/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "userId": 123,
    "accountIds": ["vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D", "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFED45RT"],
    "strategyType": 'ANALYZE_INVEST',
    "params": [{ key: "max_amount", value:"500.00" }],
    "status": "ACTIVE"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "userId": 123,
    "accountIds": ["vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFXGK98D", "vzeNDwK7KQIm4yEog683uElbp9GRLEFED45RT"],
    "strategyType": "ANALYZE_INVEST",
    "params": [{ key: "max_amount", value:"500.00" }],
    "fundIds": [124,156],
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Necessary parameter(s) are missing"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid strategyType value"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid strategy"
}

/strategies/:id Edit

Deletes a user

Deletes a book in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/strategies/123",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 123,
  "status": "deleted"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Strategy doesn't exist"
}

/investments Edit

Create Investment, called after the investment is settled with the broker dealer

Parameters
subscriptionId
The subscriptionId, this will be passed to you in the ledger
fundHoldingId
The fund holding ID
amount
Amount invested
unitPrice
Fund unit price

The book will automatically be added to your reading list

Adds a book to your collection.

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/investments/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "subscriptionId" : 123,
  "investmentDetails" : [
    {
      "fundHoldingId" : 1,
      "amount" : 345.00,
      "unitPrice" : 23.00
    },
    {
      "fundHoldingId" : 2,
      "amount" : 245.00,
      "unitPrice" : 34.00
    },
    {
      "fundHoldingId" : 3,
      "amount" : 350.00,
      "unitPrice" : 34.00
    }
  ],
  "date" :  "2017-11-19 17:46:48"
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id" : 234,
  "subscriptionId" : 123,
  "investmentDetails" : [
    {
      "fundHoldingId" : 1,
      "amount" : 345.00,
      "unitPrice" : 23.00
    },
    {
      "fundHoldingId" : 2,
      "amount" : 245.00,
      "unitPrice" : 34.00
    },
    {
      "fundHoldingId" : 3,
      "amount" : 350.00,
      "unitPrice" : 34.00
    }
  ],
  "date" :  "2017-11-19 17:46:48"
}
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid parameter"
}

/investment/:id/history Edit

Get the history of all investments

Get all the past investments associated with this investment.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/investment/3/history",
  "type": "GET",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id" : 3,
  "accountBalance" : 12200.00,
  "investmentAmount": 11200.00, 
  "pendingBalance": 7.00,
  "investmentThreshold": 10.00,
  "icon_url": "https://image.ibb.co/b96EUa/ABSA1.png",
  "holdings": [
    {
      "fundName" : "SELECT EQUITY FUNDS",
      "fundId" : 2,
      "weight": 25,
      "closePrice": 123.00,
      "fundIcon_url": "https://image.ibb.co/b96EUa/Core.png",
      "fundFactsheet_url": "https://www.absainvestments.co.za/wealth-and-investment-management/e-docs/fund-fact-sheets/Absa%20Select%20Equity%20Fund.pdf"
    },
    {
      "fundName" : "BALANCED FUND",
      "fundId" : 3,
      "weight": 75,
      "closePrice": 423.00,
      "fundIcon_url": "http://image.ibb.co/iNKqX5/Balance.png",
      "fundFactsheet_url": "https://www.absainvestments.co.za/wealth-and-investment-management/e-docs/fund-fact-sheets/Absa%20Balanced%20Fund.pdf"
    }
  ],
  "performance": [
    {
      "asofdate": "2017-12-06 17:46:48",
      "balance": 10100.00,
      "gain": 100.00
    },
    {
      "asofdate": "2017-11-29 17:46:48",
      "balance": 90100.00,
      "gain": 100.00
    },
    {
      "asofdate": "2017-11-19 17:46:48",
      "balance": 8100.00,
      "gain": 100.00
    },
    {
      "asofdate": "2017-11-12 17:46:48",
      "balance":7000.00,
      "gain": 100.00
    }
  ],
  "created" : "2017-11-12 17:46:48"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Investment doesn't exist"
}

/investment/:id/log Edit

Get the logs for an investment. The logs are transactions contributed to an investment, eg. the transactions we rounded-up to make an investment

Get all the past investments associated with this investment.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/investment/3/log",
  "type": "GET",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id" : 3,
  "transactions": [
  {

/robo/questions Edit

List all risk tolerance questions for the robo recommendation

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of accounts returned

This call will return a maximum of 100 accounts

Lists all the risk tolerence questions. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/robo/questions", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/robo/questions", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.kapitalwise.com/robo/questions?token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
  console.log(body);
}

curl http://api.kapitalwise.com/robo/questions?key=YOUR_APP_KEY

/robo/recommend Edit

Return an investment product based on the user's risk tolerence

Parameters
userId
The user for the fund is recommend
questionId
The Id of the question
answerId
The selected answer Id

This call will return an investment fund based on the user’s risk tolerance

Investment fund based on the user’s risk tolerance

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/robo/recommend", { 
"token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
"userId":123,
"userResponses": [
{
  "questionId": 1, 
  "answerId": 1
},
{
  "questionId": 2, 
  "answerId": 3
}
{
  "questionId": 3, 
  "answerId": 4
}]
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id" : 123,
  "externalProductId" : "313",
  "fundName" : "ABSA SELECT EQUITY FUNDS",
  "fundCode" : "ABSAEQTY",
  "fundFactsheet" : "https://www.absainvestments.co.za/wealth-and-investment-management/e-docs/fund-fact-sheets/Absa%20Select%20Equity%20Fund.pdf",
  "fundInfo" : "High risk fund for investors who are not risk cautious. This fund is suitable for investors who seek long-term capital growth from equity exposure",
  "fundIconUrl" : "https://image.ibb.co/b96EUa/Core.png",
  "symbol" : "ABSAEQTY",
  "cusip" : "008000AA7",
  "fundType" : "HighRisk"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Could not recommend any product"
}

/analytics/:id Edit

Get user's personal financial analytics

The /analytics/:id endpoint allows developers to receive user financial analytics data for credit and depository-type Accounts. Analytics data is standardized across accounts. This API also provides predicted future cash flow and account balances for the user.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/analytics/3", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});
